metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36230 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was discovered in OpenLDAP before 2.4.57 leading in an assertion failure in slapd in the X.509 DN parsing in decode.c ber_next_element, resulting in denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36230` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldap-utils - 2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.12
libldap-2.4-2 - 2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.12
slapd - 2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.12
slapd-smbk5pwd - 2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.12
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openldap package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.12').
